src:
Ludilo dostiže vrhunac: Jurgordenu dovoljan bod za titulu, Malme i Hamarbi vrebaju!
Borba za goli život na dnu tabele Alsvenskana

02 Nov 2019

Ludilo dostiže vrhunac. Sve oči ljubitelja fudbalske groznice u Skandinaviji biće uprte ka Norćepingu, gde dolazi lider Jurgorden sa željom da ostane neporažen. Svaki drugi epilog mogao bi da mu presedne. Jer, Malme i Hamarbi vrebaju svaki njegov pogrešan korak da ga sklone sa već viđenog prestola.
Danas od 13.00 igraju se sve utakmice poslednjeg, 30. kola veoma uzbudljivog Alsvenskana, u kome tri tima gaje šampionske ambicije, Norćeping sneva ponovni izlazak na međunarodnu scenu, a i borba za opstanak jednako je interesantna kao ona na drugom kraju tabele. Na kraju bi mogla da presudi čak i gol-razlika...
Idemo redom. Pomenuli smo da lider Jurgorden dolazi na noge Norćepingu, koji takođe ima jak motiv da pobedi. Lider iz Stokholma ima tri boda više od najbližih pratilaca, pa mu je i remi na teškom gostovanju dovoljan da se okiti lovorikama prvi put od 2005. godine. Dodatna matematika kaže da domaćin još može do četvrtog mesta, koje bi eventualno moglo da vodi u evropska takmičenja. Pošto se Kup Švedske igra tek narednog proleća, bilo bi potrebno da neki od prva tri tima na tabeli Alsvenskana osvoji trofej, kako bi i četvrtoplasirani dobio mogućnost da igra kvalifikacije za Ligu Evrope.



Drugoplasirani Malme će, dakle, morati da pobedi na gostovanju Erebru, koji je prebrinuo sve brige, a uz to da se nada kiksu Jurgordena. U istoj situaciji je i trećeplasirani Hamarbi, koji kod kuće traži pobedu protiv Hekena, inače cementiranog na šestoj poziciji.
U borbi za opstanak najlošije stoji fenjeraš Eskilstuna i Sundsval sa 20 bodova, ali imaju šansu da se eventualnim pobedama dokopaju makar mesta koje garantuje plej-aut, a ono trenutno drži Falkenberg sa 22 boda. Upravo Falkenberg dočekuje Eskilstunu i to će biti duel koji će direktno da odluči sudbinu dva kluba.

ŠVEDSKA 1 - POSLEDNJE 30. KOLO

text:
Madness reaches its climax: enough title for Jurgorden, Malmo and Hammarby lurking!
The fight for bare life at the bottom of the Alsvenskan table

02 Nov 2019

Insanity is climaxing. All eyes of fans of football fever in Scandinavia will be directed towards Norrkoping, where leader Jurgorden comes in with a desire to remain undefeated. Any other epilogue could precede him. Because Malmo and Hammarby are lurking at every wrong step to get him off the seen throne.
Today from 13.00 all games of the last, 30th round of the very exciting Alsvenskan are played, in which three teams have championship ambitions, Norrkoping dreams of returning to the international stage, and the fight for survival is as interesting as the one at the other end of the table. In the end, even a goal-difference could judge ...
Let's go in turn. We mentioned that leader Jurgorden is back on the feet of Norrkoping, who also has a strong motive to win. The Stockholm leader has three points more than his closest companions, so a heavy-duty draw is enough to put him on the laurels for the first time since 2005. The extra math says the host can still get to fourth place, which could possibly lead to European competitions. With the Swedish Cup only playing out next spring, it would take some of the top three teams in the Alsvenskan standings to win the trophy in order for the fourth-placed team to qualify for the Europa League.



The runner-up Malmö will therefore have to win away to Erebre, who has taken care of all the worries while hoping for a Jurgorden kickoff. In the same situation is third-placed Hammarby, who is at home seeking a win against Hacken, otherwise cemented in sixth position.
The Eskilstuna and Sundsvall lanterns are the worst in the fight for survival with 20 points, but they have a chance to at least win the places guaranteed by the play-off, with Falkenberg currently holding 22 points. It is Falkenberg who welcomes Eskilstuna and it will be a duel that will directly decide the fate of the two clubs.

SWEDEN 1 - LAST DAY 30
